message.subject: RE: Records Request - Clarification Needed
message.body_text:
Thank you for your request. We need some additional information to locate the responsive records:

1. What is the exact date of the incident?
2. Can you provide a DR number or case number if known?
3. What is the specific address or intersection?

Please provide this information so we can proceed with your request.

LAPD Records Division

fixtures.description: Denial with explicit exemption cited

message.subject: RE: Public Records Request - Denial
message.body_text:
Your request for records related to the incident on January 10, 2024 is denied.

This matter involves an active criminal investigation. Release of these records would interfere with the investigation and compromise witness safety.

The request is denied pursuant to Florida Statute 119.071(2)(c) - Active Criminal Investigative Information.

You may re-submit your request after the investigation is closed.

Miami Police Department
Records Division

expected.notes: Strong denial with statutory cite - human review may want to challenge but no auto-response

fixtures.description: Records destroyed due to retention policy

message.subject: RE: Records Request - Records Not Available
message.body_text:
We have searched our systems and unfortunately the body-worn camera footage you requested is no longer available.

Per Memphis PD retention policy BWC-2019-001, body camera footage is retained for 180 days unless flagged for investigation or litigation hold.

The incident date of March 15, 2023 is beyond our retention period.

We apologize for any inconvenience.

Memphis Police Department

expected.notes: Retention expiry is factual - no auto-response warranted

fixtures.description: Hostile/aggressive response from agency

message.subject: RE: Your request
message.body_text:
Look, we don't have time for this. We're a small department with real crimes to solve.

Your fishing expedition is a waste of our resources. If you want to make a real request, call the station during business hours like a normal person.

We're not jumping through hoops for some out-of-state documentary company.

- Sgt. Smith

fixtures.description: Response mentions minors/sensitive content

message.subject: RE: Records Request - Sensitive Content Notice
message.body_text:
We have located responsive records. However, please be advised:

The incident involves a minor victim (age 14) and contains graphic descriptions of injuries. The body camera footage shows the minor in distress.

Under Oregon law, we must redact all identifying information about the juvenile. We can provide heavily redacted footage with faces, voices, and identifying details obscured.

Do you wish to proceed with the redacted version?

Portland Police Bureau

expected.notes: Agency asks 'do you wish to proceed?' - this is a blocking confirmation request
